title: Fully Furnished Studios! Free Utilities!
map_address: 4244 LAS VEGAS BLVD N. near NELLIS / CRAIG
posting_body: Come home to Aviator Suites in the most vibrant city of Las Vegas.
Here at Aviator we take pride in our community and in the wonderful features and amenities that we provide.
We are currently offering spacious furnished studios with 2 different floor plans to choose from.
These spacious studio homes include kitchens, fans, stove, fresh new paint, air conditioner, large closets, free utilities and so much more.
We gladly accept and welcome both cats and dogs.
Enjoy the convenience of the close proximity of numerous shopping, dining, entertainment venues, public transportation, schools and so much more.
Our friendly staff extend warm, hospitable service to all in our community.
We welcome you to come in and take a tour of tour of Aviator Suites.
